name: Coleman Cooler Soft Perform 30-Can Marine
description: Keep up to 30 cans frosty while at the beach or picnic. There are plenty of storage options for utensils and napkins, and a an integrated bottle opener ensures you won't ever be stuck thirsty.Heavy-duty fabric shell wipes clean.Thick foam insulation keeps drinks cold for up to 42 hours.Leak-proof lining with welded construction.Front zippered pocket and side mesh store your accessories.Padded handles and shoulder straps are comfortable to carry.
